data.title: Your horoscope for Nov 15-21
data.description: Your spot-on horoscope for work, money and relationship from Guru by the Bangkok Post

data.title: Motor Expo 2024 aims to give ailing Thai auto industry a shot in the arm
data.description: 42 car brands from nine countries, 22 motorcycle brands from 7 countries to be showcased

data.title: International artistry on display at world puppet festival in Thailand
data.description: Professional puppet artists from 13 countries are demonstrating their skills in imparting scientific knowledge at the National Science Museum (NSM) in Pathum Thani province, which is hosting the Harmony World Puppet Innovation Festival 2024.

data.title: PM pushes Thailand’s tech potential in private sector meetings
data.description: Paetongtarn meets with top executives of Google, TikTok and Microsoft to discuss government’s emphasis on digital skills

data.title: Thaksin promises big economic reforms in Udon Thani
data.description: While campaigning for Pheu Thai’s PAO candidate, former PM vows to ease hardships and deliver a revitalised local economy by mid-2025

data.title: Finance Ministry sees THAI’s rehab exit in Feb, no extra funds needed
data.description: The Thai national carrier is on track to exit its rehabilitation process by February 2025, with plans to re-list on the Stock Exchange by May thanks to strong performance

data.title: Pheu Thai, Thaksin face crucial test in Udon Thani election
data.description: Surge in support for People’s Party at next week’s PAO election could signal trouble for Shinawatra-led government

data.title: Phuket shielding sea, dugongs against Loy Krathong trash
data.description: Phuket authorities are mobilising to protect the island’s marine life, including endangered dugongs, from a surge of festival debris during tonight's Loy Krathong celebrations.

data.title: UNICEF launches “Box of Life” appeal to deliver life-saving support for children in crisis
data.description: BANGKOK, 15 November 2024 - UNICEF Thailand today launches an urgent appeal to the public to back its “Box of Life” initiative. This is at the heart of UNICEF's new nationwide campaign, “A Better Tomorrow Today.”

data.title: AOT eyes increasing Suvarnabhumi’s transit flights
data.description: Plan is to have transit flights make up 20% of all flights and turn Thailand’s main international airport into a major aviation hub

data.title: Thai beauty stuns in traditional Siripattara Siwalai costume
data.description: Miss Thailand Suchata ‘Opal’ Chuangsri dons Thai designer Teschvit Krutsang’s creation inspired by a traditional outfit worn at royal events

data.title: Don your Stetson: Saraburi gets ready to host cowboy festival
data.description: The mysterious East gives a nod to the Wild West with a fun cowboy festival featuring delicious street food and concerts

data.title: Ban Chiang artefacts returned to National Museum
data.description: The earthenware pieces had been gifted to the US Embassy in Bangkok in the 1960s by an American soldier

data.title: GULF’s core profit grew 12% YoY to THB 4.71 billion in Q3/24 from energy business and share of profit from INTUCH
data.description: Gulf Energy Development Plc. (GULF) reported the financial results for Q3/24 with a total revenue of THB 31.259 billion, a growth of 11% from Q3/23 and a core profit of THB 4.71 billion, a 12% increase from THB 4.203 billion in the same quarter of the previous year.

data.title: Ransomware continues to pummel organisations in Southeast Asia
data.description: Kaspersky Cybersecurity Solutions for Southeast Asian businesses detected 57,571 ransomware attacks from January to June 2024.

data.title: Thailand expects 4 million more visitors annually after passing same-sex marriage act
data.description: Legislative change is expected to lift Thailand’s GDP by 0.3% by bringing in more revenue from tourism and generating a slew of new jobs across tourism and the broader economy.

data.title: Ransomware continues to pummel organisations in Southeast Asia
data.description: Kaspersky Cybersecurity Solutions for businesses in Southeast Asia (SEA) detected 57,571 ransomware attacks from January to June 2024.

data.title: Thailand is set to attract an estimated 4 million additional visitors a year following the introduction of the same-sex marriage act.
data.description: Legislative change is expected to lift Thailand’s GDP by 0.3% by bringing in more revenue from tourism as well as generating a slew of new jobs across tourism and the broader economy.

data.title: Siam City Cement Group (SCCC) reports strong Q3 2024 performance with 79% net profit growth
data.description: Siam City Cement Group (SCCC) announced an impressive Q3 2024 financial performance, showcasing a substantial YoY net profit surged by 79% to THB 790 million and YoY EBITDA growth at 15%.

data.title: From Basque country to Bangkok
data.description: Chef Yoshitsugu Yamamoto, owner of Michelin-starred Alarde in Osaka, Japan, is set to make waves in Bangkok this month with an exclusive two-night guest shift on Nov 21 and 22 at UNO MAS at Centara Grand at CentralWorld.
